Qualifications required: Matriculation from a recognised board, two years experience in examination of finger print
Salary or compensation details: Level - 3 of the Pay Matrix (Pre-revised: PB-1 Rs. 5200-20200/-) with Grade Pay of Rs. 2000/-
Contact details: Assistant Director (Admn.), National Crime Records Bureau, Ministry of Home Affairs, NH-8, Mahipalpur, New Delhi-110037; Tel.No.011-26735521; E-mail: admin.ad@ncrb.gov.in
